author: stefanegli
msg: OAK-3238 : update lease more often: after 20sec instead of 30sec already - this allows to make the lease-check on the other hand to have a larger safety-margin: the lease check now fails if the lease is only valid for another 20sec (instead of timing out at the very end, which has zero margin)

author: janhoy
msg: SOLR-7961: Add version command to bin/solr start script. Also adds -h for help (backport)

msg: OAK-2849 Improve revision gc on SegmentMK
- tweaked the nodestore init to use the builder
